definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Here are a few carrier pigeons is not bad.
sentences.chinese: 这里有几只信鸽也不错。

sentences.english: As a result, the carrier pigeon.
sentences.chinese: 他收到一封由信鸽传送的短信。

sentences.english: The homing pigeon can be trained to carry out the mission that people demand.
sentences.chinese: 信鸽可以训练用来执行人们所要求的任务。

sentences.english: Any of a breed of domestic pigeons resembling owls.
sentences.chinese: 家鸽的一种，类似信鸽，有暗黑的羽毛。

sentences.english: That group of pigeons would form the core of the PLA's first military pigeon brigade.
sentences.chinese: 那群信鸽组成了PLA的军方鸽子部队的核心。

sentences.english: Found inside a pile of pigeon and a turtledove, color really looks good.
sentences.chinese: 发现一堆信鸽里面有一只斑鸠，花色还真的很好看。

sentences.english: Keeping carrier pigeons is his hobby.
sentences.chinese: 养信鸽是他的业余爱好。

definition: pigeon/dove/various birds of the family Columbidae
Flying Pigeon (famous bicycle brand, made in Tianjin since 1936)
(bird species of China) snow pigeon (Columba leuconota)
(bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)
(bird species of China) saker falcon (Falco cherrug)
to send word/to deliver a letter
(bird species of China) peregrine falcon (Falco peregrinus)
